concept.title: Origins
concept.shortdesc: An origin stage represents the source data for the pipeline. You can use a single origin stage in a pipeline.

conbody.p:
originsoverviewYou can use the following types of origins in a pipeline:
Directory - Reads files from a directory.
File Tail - Reads data as it is written to an active file after reading related archived files in the directory.
HTTP Client - Reads data from a streaming HTTP resource URL.
Kafka Consumer - Reads data from Kafka.
Kinesis Consumer - Reads data from Kinesis.
